Allen Iverson had 26 points, nine assists, and combined with Linas Kleiza , JR Smith and Eduardo Nájera on a 14-1 fourth-quarter spurt that Carrie Underwoodd the Nuggets to a 125-114 victory over the New Jersey Nets on Friday night. We've been struggling, losing two on the road and we just wanted to do anything to get a win, Allen Iverson said after scoring 21 second-half points to help the Nuggets break a two-game losing streak.
